text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Get real @toryboypierce be realistic ! Impossible to conjur something from nothing, the Government have played this carefully and with the best advice, very easy to criticise in hindsight and very weak journalism !! #redtop you are slightly better than that...
